story_18_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hey, Cheren.
What’s with the long face?
story_18_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Well, you went on a massive journey around
the Unova region...
story_18_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
and I followed a similar path right there
along with you. Now I’m a Gym Leader.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Honestly, I think we make a pretty strong team,
and I’m totally confident in our battle skills.
It’s just that...
story_18_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
We might have to go up against Champion-level
Trainers from here on out.
If we’re lucky, we’ll be evenly matched.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In some respects, we’re here as challengers.
There are probably going to be some rough
battles up ahead.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: Yeah. I’ve been thinking the same thing.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Moving forward in this competition is going to
require more strength and power than we’ve
ever had to use before.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
And...seeking victory for victory’s sake won’t
be enough. We’ll have to battle as a team—
use our strength to help one another...
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
That’s the sort of battling that’s going to be
expected of us from here on out.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Use our strength to help one another, huh?
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Hm? What are you laughing at?
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I just remembered how you were
before we started exploring Unova.
You really have changed a lot since then.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I don’t know whether to take that as a
compliment or an insult...
story_18_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’ll admit that I’ve had tunnel vision in the past
when it comes to winning. I didn’t really know
what I wanted back then.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
But the experiences I had and the people I
met along the way helped me figure that out
for myself.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
You got that right. I want to use everything
I learned during my journey to triumph in
this tournament.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I think I might know someone who’s in the
same boat as us!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Cheren! I’m talking about somebody who might
wanna join our team for the PML!
Come on, follow me!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Hey, Cheren! Hilbert told me everything.
If it’s about Pokémon battles, leave it to me!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
I’ve always wanted to team up and battle with
you two. We’d be like Team Unova!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You’ve seen firsthand what an awesome Trainer
Hilda is, right, Cheren?
story_18_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
And all three of us have gone through similar
journeys across Unova, right? I was thinking...
that might help us really get in sync as a team!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: I see... That sounds like a great idea!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Hilbert’s right. I already know for a fact that
you’re passionate about Pokémon battling.
It practically radiates off of you.
story_18_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
So you’ll join our team then?
I look forward to battling together!
story_18_01000/2401_1001_3500_10:
All right! Now that we have a full team,
let’s train! Victory or bust!
